title: Anniversary of the PC!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Huh......Whaaat~!? ......Maru lost, zura......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You lived longer than last time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>But that doesn’t change the fact that Maru gets hit as soon as she steps out into the battlefield! Ugh, PC games are hard...... Technology just isn’t Maru’s friend......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I wish I could teach you better. Sorry, Hanamaru-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>No, Maru is sorry that she isn’t able to be a good teammate! Maru just wants to have more fun playing~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>How about a board game? You can also play board games on a PC, and since you only have to point and click, your reaction time and aim accuracy won’t matter. Let’s see, there’s this one......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Whoa, there are these kinds of games too!? Hehe...... Is this a strategy board game?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. You put your pieces on the grid, set up a formation, and try to take over the board. If you trap the opponent’s piece with your piece, you can capture their piece. It’s like the game Reversi.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Mm, Maru thinks she can play this one! Technology can put a smile on Maru’s face~! I won’t lose this time, Rina-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ten rounds, let’s play!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
